text: what's up everyone quick market update I am going to talk about gme in just a second I want to talk about a couple other broad Market things really fast specifically if we take a look at CPI it came in pretty light today so this starts to become interesting as we move forward because the market immediately took this to mean that we are going to be moving into a period of rate Cuts that's exactly what the market shifted today because you could tell large caps came down SPX then if we take a look at the Russell that flew off the handle to the upside it had one of its biggest biggest gaps and days year-to date for sure and in the near term so the market is starting to Pivot a little bit here and I just think it's important for people to be aware of that we also saw bonds see a bit of an update here as well as a lot of folks know I have kind of positions in a lot of the different indices themselves even TLT had a pretty significant Gap up here so from a broader perspective outside of the individual product that I typically talk about on the updates here I do want to let everybody to know that this is happening and this will trickle down to the sectors and it offers a ton of trading opportunities so just for General consumption now let's get back to what

text: we go to this probability analysis we can see what this might look like for tomorrow and we can see what the probability of touching some of these different prices are so if we take a look at the 12th the probability of touching 2334 is about 16 chance and then 2777 is about 16 this is a one standard deviation cone by the way so that's why they're both at 16 but it just gives you an idea of range tomorrow it's a 16 chance of touching 27 16 perc chance of getting down to like 23 and A2 so not not a not a giant range now the interesting part though is that if this does start drifting up towards this 27 handle these 26s fall in the money there's some oi not a ton so I don't see this serving as some sort of massive gamma ramp although I absolutely would expect to see some hedging activity coming into expiration if these do fall in the money so it can get interesting but this doesn't look like it would be the impetus for a massive massive squeeze whether it's a gamma squeeze short squeeze either or I don't really see that being the trigger here you kind of need like really heavy oi and especially if it's stacked right so in this case it's light across the entire exporation cycle so we'll see who knows you never know that's the fun part with GameStop it's kind of

text: don't really see that being the trigger here you kind of need like really heavy oi and especially if it's stacked right so in this case it's light across the entire exporation cycle so we'll see who knows you never know that's the fun part with GameStop it's kind of like watching heavyweights fight they always have a puncher's chance so because they have the power to put somebody to sleep they can lose five rounds and then in the fifth round essentially Knocks somebody cold so that could be the case here but so far it's looking relatively quiet until we see a little bit more of a catalist interesting that price was not pushed down but we will see how we follow through tomorrow obviously I'm here keeping an eye on it so any questions let me know be an outlier see you guys later
